channel.title: Editing Items On RSCD V25
channel.description: Ok, ive been messing around with the itemdef.xml, Itemwieldable.xml trying to make items wieldable and appear different color ive got them to where i can wear the item to before i couldnt but when i put them on it turns the part i put on invisable when wearing, them ive changed animation.xml in clientconf but i dont even think animation file is even changing could someone tell me what files i need to edit to fix my problem. RSCD V25 Source Thx

item.title: Editing Items On RSCD V25
item.dc:creator: @j_3_s_u_s j 3 s u s
item.description:
@j_3_s_u_s wrote:

Ok, ive been messing around with the itemdef.xml, Itemwieldable.xml trying to make items wieldable and appear different color ive got them to where i can wear the item to before i couldnt but when i put them on it turns the part i put on invisable when wearing, them ive changed animation.xml in clientconf but i dont even think animation file is even changing could someone tell me what files i need to edit to fix my problem.
RSCD V25 Source
Thx

Read full topic
